name: FMX 2nd Edition
description:
This is FMX™ 2nd Edition, a free, minimalist RPG I designed during the Covid-19 pandemic. I did it to play with friends, the awesome Horoscope Zine community on Discord.

I love Sword & Sorcery and FMX™ is the perfect match for my Shadowlords™ Dark Fantasy setting gaming sessions. It’s easy to learn and play. It’s also brutal and exciting! I hope you enjoy it.

Proofing: Rossi Antúnez, Sean F. Smith
